about_the_game:
Get ready to take on the monster Lake Hartwell and the most professional bass fishing tournament – The Bassmaster Classic®. It’s time to go head-to-head with the competition and compete in a 3-round final on the Bassmaster® 2022 Classic venue to become the champion and take home the coveted trophy.
In real life this iconic venue is a 56,000-acre man-made reservoir situated between Georgia and South Carolina and is fed by the Savannah, Tugaloo and Seneca rivers. Explore and fish from the Green Pond boat ramps to the Portman Marina of Lake Hartwell. The venue comes with a variety of habitats and a good population of Largemouth and Spotted Bass, making this a perfect place to test anglers!
Lake Hartwell also comes packed with 3 Pro Challenges to compete directly against the best anglers out there, Mastery Challenges for unique Lake Hartwell clothing, 10 new Legendary fish to hunt down and variety of fish species to land.

Key Features Include:
- The prestigious Bassmaster Classic 2022 venue - Lake Hartwell
- The Bassmaster Classic 3 round finals
- 3 competitive Pro Challenges
- 2 Tiers of Mastery Challenges with Special Bassmaster Classic & Lake Hartwell clothing
- 17 Species of Fish to catch
- Dynamic time of day system for all day fishing
- 10 Legendary named fish to hunt down and catch
- Underwater structure and realistic environments to explore
